'shri lanka aarakshaka hamudawan yuda aparadha sidukara atha' yana jiniwa mithyawa sanatha kala haki nawa panath dekak me wana wita sammatha kara gena athi me sirisena - wikramasinha hawul aanduwa, jathika buddhi balakaye niladharin rasak dadayam kirime meheyumak aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa haraha arambaa athi bawa jathika nidahas peramune jathika sanwidhayaka parlimenthu manthri jayantha samarawira anawaranaya kara sitiyeya.

obe liyamane eeka parshawika gathiyak athi bawa dane.ewaka rajaya saha mahajana pakshaye maruwan wisin wishala minis sanharayak kalasema deshapremi janatha wiyaparaya magin kala minis ghathana sambandawada oba wisin sandahan kalanam honda bawa kiyami.ma nam me siyalla ath dakina ladi.goni billan idiriye gaman kirime wasanawa kipa witakama mata ath widinnata siduwiya.esema niwasa idiripita wan rathayak natharakala hamawitama palayannata sudanam wi siti hatida mathakaya.esema deshapremin wisin dali pihiwalin katawal kapu game ahinsaka kasippu karayanda dutimi.owunkala warada wuwe hora math pan bima saha wikinimaya.esema nila nowana andiri nithi kalayedi thama kadaye weladam kala waradata thama hisa watakanuwaka sawikara ganimata siduwu welendanda dutimi.ewaka shrilanka nidahas pakshikayan wu apa nam deparshwayema bhishanaye goduru wu bawa kiya yuthuya.
